Прикольная игра, проходиться на одном дыхании.

Portal 2 começa onde o primeiro jogo termina. 
Depois de ter derrotado GLaDOS (a máquina assassina) Chell, protagonista da série, acorda numa tranquila sala, na qual esteve a dormir por muitos anos. 

Conhecemos então Wheatley, um pequeno robô em forma de bolo aparentemente simpático e que nos oferece ajuda para escapar de ali.

A história vai dar algumas "cambalhotas" e personagens que julgávamos do nosso lado irão mostrar que afinal ainda são piores do que o nosso pior inimigo. 

No meio disto tudo, ainda há espaço para uma pequena lição de moral sobre a humanidade, demonstrando que, tal como disse uma vez Abraham Lincoln, "se queres testar o carácter de um homem, dá-lhe poder". Neste caso, aplicado aos robôs.

Mas, para além disto, o modo cooperativo também tem a sua própria história e enredo, cativando bastante a uma segunda jogatina após passar a campanha, e descobrir mais sobre GLaDOS.

This game is a great follow-up of the classic Portal, with larger chambers, more atmosphere, and an even more stellar plot. I was not expecting it to be this good, but it blew my mind. Recommended for anyone who plays puzzle games, or wants to be introduced to the genre. Play the original first though.

Excelente com um humor inteligente e legenda em português, pra mim não é um problema mas é otimo que pensem no Brasil.Só que você vai se frustrar e não vai ser pouco mas o jogo é simplesmente fantástico.
Good Game
Just Bad

I'd say I am a vivid gamer. Let's say I have played approximately 3% of this world's games. Among those 3%, there might be a best action game(Vanquish), there might be a best platformer(Super Meat Boy), there might be a best roguelike(FTL), there might be the best party game(Speedrunners). But when it comes to a game, that's the absolute perfect package, the best game in all regards, THE BEST GAME EVER, it is, and will probably be for a long time, Portal 2.

The game has a less scary and deserted feel than the first portal, but that doesn't really mean bad like everyone who points it out says it is, that's all i gotta say about it
The portal 2 sdk is really what made me play this game a lot though, you've got people like camben making these awesome maps with all sorts of "illusions" and even new game content that you can experience with a friend if it's a co-op map.

知名度抜群の前作の見事な続編です。家庭用ゲーム機への展開も考慮されたためでしょうか、前作ほどのシビアなアクションもほとんど要求されず、手順を模索する純粋なパズルに近付きました。

ヤンデレAI "GLaDOS" も悪口に磨きがかかり、非人道的ブラック企業 "Aperture Science" の悪行も次々に露呈します。レトロ・フューチャー寄りのアートワークは素晴らしく、巨大構造を意識させるステージを着実に踏破する感覚はたまりません。

クリア後もタイムアタックやステージ編集、その他の追加要素で飽きさせない手堅い内容です。

Un jeu digne de son prédecesseur ! Que ça soit Portal 1 ou Portal 2, la saga Portal est une saga original, au gameplay intéressant et avec un scénario plutôt poussé ! Les jeux ne valent pas de l'or ( comparé aux pseudos jeux tels COD ) et on se fait vraiment plaisir à y jouer, à condition de ne pas trop rager sur une salle de test ahah. Si vous n'avez pas terminé Portal 1, ne jouez pas à Portal 2, les deux se suivent et le scénario est trop bien réalisé pour en perdre la moitié ! Bref, une saga que je recommande

Portal 2 is one of the best games I have ever played. As a puzzle lover, I really enjoyed solving portal 2's chambers. Althogh some of them was really easy for me, some was really, really hard.
Putting the puzzles aside, I love the story. I find myself queting wheatley and glados every day, And the chambers themself are designed so well and they fit exactly to the plot.
Of course all of the easter eggs are just lovley, and the drawings on the walls (also in portal (1)) are making me say WTF each and every time.

To summerize, I love portal 2 and I couldn't build it better, in any aspect.


If you haven't played it already, then please play it, it's awesome, and maybe you will come through one of my chambers sometime :)
Hope I helped you

Portal 2 was a solid game but it didn't match the tone and difficulty of the first game. I thought Portal 1 was a gem in a sea of remakes and sequals and loved every moment of the game. But I believe Portal 2 didn't delivery the expectations the the first one left. It added a long, almost complex story line, and added mechanics, but it didn't do the first one justice. It added to the lore and gave a new view of Aperture but I suggest playing the first game over the second. But it was still a good game and I do recommend it.

Před koupí téhle hry jsem otálel, nějak nejsem fanoušek logických her a radši bych příběh, lidské postavy a silný zážitek. Všechno by se rozhodně usnadnilo, kdybych si v nějaké recenzi přečetl, že logika je tak 50 procent kouzla Portalu a zbytek je příběh, lidské postavy (byť je ve hře přesně jeden živý člověk) a silný zážitek. A navíc humor! Humor tak vtipný a minimalistický, až budete žasnout, kolik ho dostali do hry, kde se posunují bedny portály. Nad ničím nepřemýšlejte a kupte to, Portal je nadčasová klasika s designem od srdíčka.
